metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3575 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description: A heap-based buffer overflow was found in openjpeg in color.c:379:42 in sycc420_to_rgb when decompressing a crafted .j2k file. An attacker could use this to execute arbitrary code with the permissions of the application compiled against openjpeg.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> as of 2022-03-31, the proposed pull as not been commited emitorino> as of 2022-05-27, the proposed pull as not been commited

criterions.comment: blender package in impish is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2022-03-31').
insighttoolkit4 package in impish is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2022-03-31').
openjpeg2 package in impish is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2022-05-27').
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in impish is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2022-03-31').
texmaker package in impish is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2022-03-31').
